# Issue Type

## Description
A clear and concise description of the problem or feature.

## Steps to Reproduce (if bug)
1. Go to '...'
2. Click on '...'
3. See error

## Expected Behavior (if bug)
Describe what you expected to happen.

## Motivation / Use Case (if feature)
Why is this feature useful or necessary?

## Proposed Implementation (if feature)
(Optional) Describe how you imagine this feature could be implemented.

## Screenshots / Logs
If applicable, add screenshots or logs to help explain your problem.

- OS: [e.g., Windows 10, MacOS 13]
